title: 05/17/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/17/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Clippers are clearly still scared of the Lakers based on how they finished the season. He proclaims Steph Curry as the greatest shooter of all time after another impressive season from the 2-time MVP. He also tells you why he was wrong about James Harden and right about Tim Tebow. Plus, Warriors insider Marcus Thompson joins the show to talk about the Warriors preparing for the playoffs and if Kevin Durant is happier now in Brooklyn.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
